questions:

A) Wildlife and animals
B) Art and culture
C) A skeleton sitting on chair
D) Sports event

B) A sports event
C) A skeleton sitting on chair
D) A family gathering

A) A person reading a book
B) A skeleton sitting on a chair
C) A group of people having a picnic
D) A dog playing with a ball

A) A tree
B) A skeleton
C) A dog
D) A bicycle

D) A parking lot

A) A water bowl
B) A bicycle
C) A picnic table
D) A flower bed

B) Sunglasses
C) A helmet
D) A scarf

A) Only children are welcome

D) Stone
